params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.disk_size_gb
params.description: Specifies the size of the disk in base-2 GB.

params.name: data.disk_type
params.description: Specifies the desired disk type on the node. This disk type must be a local storage type (e.g.: local-ssd). Note that for nodeTemplates, this should be the name of the disk type and not its URL.
